biography.bio: Péter Rudolf was born on October 15, 1959 in Budapest, Hungary. He is an actor and writer, known for Süni és barátai (1995), Beugró (2007) and Glass Tiger (2001). He has been married to Eszter Nagy-Kálózy since 1990. They have two children.
biography.name: Péter Rudolf

biography.bio: Lehel Kovács was born on October 6, 1982 in Horgos, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Munkaügyek (2012), Liza the Fox-Fairy (2015) and Intimate Headshot (2009).
biography.name: Lehel Kovács

biography.bio: Zoltán Seress was born in Kiskunfélegyháza, Hungary and raised up in Kecskemét. As a child, he wanted to be an aero engineer. This was also his father's request who has been serving at the air force for long. He went to a high school in Kecskemét. While there he was joined a youth acting group. His much success encouraged him to apply to the College of Dramatic Art in Budapest but was refused twice. After accomplishing military service (it was compulsory in the 80s Hungary) he went on to study acting at the Studio of National Theatre. After a year of studying he went to the CoDA again in 1983 and finally he was accepted. Graduated in 1987. He was a member of VÍgszínház (1987-1993), Art Theatre and Thalia Theatre (1993-1996) in Budapest. Had important roles at the Szigligeti Theatre of Szolnok, also several roles on TV, cinema and radio. Mostly well-known from Magyar Vándor (2004) and Just Sex and Nothing Else (2005). In 2004 Zoltán Seress debuted as director with Eisemann-Zágon's Peter Black at Ujvideki Theatre. Same year he joined the company of Bárka Theatre in Budapest. Since 1st of March 2008 he has held the position of theatre director, still acting nevertheless.
biography.name: Zoltán Seress

biography.bio: Zoltán Rajkai was born on December 27, 1969 in Budapest, Hungary. He is an actor and composer, known for District! (2004), Parkoló (2014) and Rosszfiúk (2000).
biography.name: Zoltán Rajkai

biography.bio: Nóra Trokán was born on August 13, 1986 in Budapest, Hungary. She is an actress, known for Tizenhárom és fél perc (2013), Balázs bazmeg (2007) and Playfellows (2014).
biography.name: Nóra Trokán

biography.bio: Ági Szirtes was born on September 21, 1955 in Budapest, Hungary. She is an actress, known for L'homme de Londres (2007), Roncsfilm (1992) and The Door (2012).
biography.name: Ági Szirtes

biography.bio: Márta Egri was born on September 11, 1950 in Budapest, Hungary. She is an actress, known for Panic (2008), A bolondok grófja (1973) and Lányarcok tükörben (1973).
biography.name: Márta Egri

biography.bio: Barnabás Janka was born on November 14, 1990 in Debrecen, Hungary. He is an actor, known for One Day of Betty (2014), Nem tüntem el... (2014) and FreeEntry (2012).
biography.name: Barnabás Janka

biography.bio: Márk Radnai is an actor and director, known for Hangyatérkép (2011), Furnitur (2013) and Fla5h (2011).
biography.name: Márk Radnai

biography.bio: Zsófia Petö is an actress, known for Plattensee (2016), Nem tüntem el... (2014) and Tömény történelem (2016).
biography.name: Zsófia Petö

biography.bio: Ádám Kovács is an actor, known for One Day of Betty (2014), The Game Creator (2016) and Pillangó (2012).
biography.name: Ádám Kovács

biography.bio: Miklós Szurdi was born on October 2, 1950 in Budapest, Hungary. He is a director and actor, known for Familia Kft. (1991), Hatásvadászok (1983) and Angyalbörben (1990). He has been married to Barbara Xantus since 1999. They have two children. He was previously married to Mária Goór Nagy.
biography.name: Miklós Szurdi

biography.bio: György Somhegyi was born on February 4, 1939 in Budapest, Hungary. He is an actor, known for The Sun Street Boys (2007), Les récidivistes (1983) and A pártfogó (1982).
biography.name: György Somhegyi

biography.bio: Zsolt Anger was born on May 4, 1969 in Szeged, Hungary. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Hacktion (2011), L'investigateur (2008) and Szalontüdö (2006).
biography.name: Zsolt Anger

biography.bio: Miklós B. Székely was born on September 15, 1948 in Budapest, Hungary. He is an actor, known for Satantango (1994), Good Evening, Mr. Wallenberg (1990) and Almanac of Fall (1984).
biography.name: Miklós B. Székely
